cards.text: Charming day it has been
cards.text_ru: Чудесный день, не правда ли
cards.text_en: Charming day it has been
cards.transcription: [ˈtʃɑːmɪŋ deɪ ɪt hæz biːn]

cards.text: Pray don't talk to me about the weather, Mr. Worthing
cards.text_ru: Прошу вас, не говорите со мной о погоде, мистер Уортинг
cards.text_en: Pray don't talk to me about the weather, Mr. Worthing
cards.transcription: [preɪ dəʊnt tɔːk tuː miː əˈbaʊt ðə ˈweðə, ˈmɪstə ˈwɜːθɪŋ]

cards.text: Whenever people talk to me about the weather, I always feel quite certain that they mean something else
cards.text_ru: Когда люди говорят со мной о погоде, я всегда чувствую, что они имеют в виду что-то другое
cards.text_en: Whenever people talk to me about the weather, I always feel quite certain that they mean something else
cards.transcription: [wenˈevə ˈpiːpl tɔːk tuː miː əˈbaʊt ðə ˈweðə, aɪ ˈɔːlweɪz fiːl kwaɪt ˈsɜːtn ðæt ðeɪ miːn ˈsʌmθɪŋ els]

cards.text: And that makes me so nervous
cards.text_ru: И это заставляет меня нервничать
cards.text_en: And that makes me so nervous
cards.transcription: [ænd ðæt meɪks miː səʊ ˈnɜːvəs]

cards.text: I do mean something else
cards.text_ru: Я действительно имею в виду что-то другое
cards.text_en: I do mean something else
cards.transcription: [aɪ duː miːn ˈsʌmθɪŋ els]

cards.text: You see, I was sure of it
cards.text_ru: Видите ли, я был уверен в этом
cards.text_en: You see, I was sure of it
cards.transcription: [juː siː, aɪ wɒz ʃʊər ɒv ɪt]

cards.text: I would like to be allowed to take advantage of Lady Bracknell's temporary absence
cards.text_ru: Я хотел бы воспользоваться временным отсутствием леди Брэкнелл
cards.text_en: I would like to be allowed to take advantage of Lady Bracknell's temporary absence
cards.transcription: [aɪ wʊd laɪk tuː biː əˈlaʊd tuː teɪk ədˈvɑːntɪdʒ ɒv ˈleɪdi ˈbræknəlz ˈtemprəri ˈæbsəns]

cards.text: I would certainly advise you to do so
cards.text_ru: Я бы определенно посоветовал вам это сделать
cards.text_en: I would certainly advise you to do so
cards.transcription: [aɪ wʊd ˈsɜːtnli ədˈvaɪz juː tuː duː səʊ]

cards.text: Mamma has a way of suddenly coming back into a room
cards.text_ru: У мамы есть привычка внезапно возвращаться в комнату
cards.text_en: Mamma has a way of suddenly coming back into a room
cards.transcription: [ˈmæmə hæz ə weɪ ɒv ˈsʌdnli ˈkʌmɪŋ bæk ˈɪntuː ə ruːm]

cards.text: I have often had to speak to her about it
cards.text_ru: Мне часто приходилось говорить с ней об этом
cards.text_en: I have often had to speak to her about it
cards.transcription: [aɪ hæv ˈɒfn hæd tuː spiːk tuː hɜːr əˈbaʊt ɪt]

cards.text: Miss Fairfax, ever since I met you I have admired you more than any girl… I have ever met since… I met you
cards.text_ru: Мисс Фэрфакс, с тех пор как я встретил вас, я восхищался вами больше, чем любой девушкой... которую встречал с тех пор... как встретил вас
cards.text_en: Miss Fairfax, ever since I met you I have admired you more than any girl… I have ever met since… I met you
cards.transcription: [mɪs ˈfeəfæks, ˈevə sɪns aɪ met juː aɪ hæv ədˈmaɪəd juː mɔː ðæn ˈeni ɡɜːl]

cards.text: I am quite well aware of the fact
cards.text_ru: Я прекрасно это понимаю
cards.text_en: I am quite well aware of the fact
cards.transcription: [aɪ æm kwaɪt wel əˈweər ɒv ðə fækt]

cards.text: I have liked you ever since I met you
cards.text_ru: Вы нравились мне с тех самых пор, как я встретил вас
cards.text_en: I have liked you ever since I met you
cards.transcription: [aɪ hæv laɪkt juː ˈevə sɪns aɪ met juː]

cards.text: Even before I met you I was very much attracted to you
cards.text_ru: Еще до того как я встретил вас, вы меня очень привлекали
cards.text_en: Even before I met you I was very much attracted to you
cards.transcription: [ˈiːvn bɪˈfɔːr aɪ met juː aɪ wɒz ˈveri mʌtʃ əˈtræktɪd tuː juː]

cards.text: We live, as I hope you know, Mr. Worthing, in an age of ideals
cards.text_ru: Мы живем, как я надеюсь вы знаете, мистер Уортинг, в эпоху идеалов
cards.text_en: We live, as I hope you know, Mr. Worthing, in an age of ideals
cards.transcription: [wiː lɪv, æz aɪ həʊp juː nəʊ, ˈmɪstə ˈwɜːθɪŋ, ɪn ən eɪdʒ ɒv aɪˈdɪəlz]

cards.text: My ideal has always been to love someone of the name of Ernest
cards.text_ru: Моим идеалом всегда было полюбить кого-то по имени Эрнест
cards.text_en: My ideal has always been to love someone of the name of Ernest
cards.transcription: [maɪ aɪˈdɪəl hæz ˈɔːlweɪz biːn tuː lʌv ˈsʌmwʌn ɒv ðə neɪm ɒv ˈɜːnɪst]

cards.text: There is something in that name that inspires absolute confidence
cards.text_ru: В этом имени есть что-то, что внушает абсолютную уверенность
cards.text_en: There is something in that name that inspires absolute confidence
cards.transcription: [ðeər ɪz ˈsʌmθɪŋ ɪn ðæt neɪm ðæt ɪnˈspaɪəz ˈæbsəluːt ˈkɒnfɪdəns]

cards.text: The moment Algernon first mentioned to me that he had a friend called Ernest, I knew I was destined to love you
cards.text_ru: В тот момент, когда Алджернон впервые упомянул мне, что у него есть друг по имени Эрнест, я понял, что мне суждено полюбить вас
cards.text_en: The moment Algernon first mentioned to me that he had a friend called Ernest, I knew I was destined to love you
cards.transcription: [ðə ˈməʊmənt ˈældʒənɒn fɜːst ˈmenʃənd tuː miː ðæt hiː hæd ə frend kɔːld ˈɜːnɪst]

cards.text: And you do love me, Gwendolen?
cards.text_ru: И вы действительно любите меня, Гвендолен?
cards.text_en: And you do love me, Gwendolen?
cards.transcription: [ænd juː duː lʌv miː, ˈɡwendəlɪn]

cards.text: Passionately!
cards.text_ru: Страстно!
cards.text_en: Passionately!
cards.transcription: [ˈpæʃənətli]

cards.text: My own Ernest!
cards.text_ru: Мой дорогой Эрнест!
cards.text_en: My own Ernest!
cards.transcription: [maɪ əʊn ˈɜːnɪst]

cards.text: Charming day it has been
cards.text_ru: Чудесный день, не правда ли
cards.text_en: Charming day it has been
cards.transcription: [ˈtʃɑːmɪŋ deɪ ɪt hæz biːn]

cards.text_ru: Прошу вас, не говорите со мной о погоде, мистер Уортинг
cards.text_en: Pray don't talk to me about the weather, Mr. Worthing
cards.transcription: [preɪ dəʊnt tɔːk tuː miː əˈbaʊt ðə ˈweðə, ˈmɪstə ˈwɜːθɪŋ]

cards.text_en: Whenever people talk to me about the weather, I always feel quite certain that they mean something else

cards.text_ru: Я действительно имею в виду что-то другое
cards.text_en: I do mean something else
cards.transcription: [aɪ duː miːn ˈsʌmθɪŋ els]

cards.text_ru: Видите ли, я был уверен в этом
cards.text_en: You see, I was sure of it
cards.transcription: [juː siː, aɪ wɒz ʃʊər ɒv ɪt]

cards.text_en: I would like to be allowed to take advantage of Lady Bracknell's temporary absence

cards.text_en: I would certainly advise you to do so

cards.transcription: [ˈmæmə hæz ə weɪ ɒv ˈsʌdnli ˈkʌmɪŋ bæk ˈɪntuː ə ruːm]
